TopicTitle: The Brut3 F0rc3, my soon Jool-5 craft

Articles.Content:
It speaks for itself. Large size, lot's of thrust, and lot's of fuel, all because I want to have a spaceplane lander as well. This is in the Fan Works section because I'm not releasing a craft file, I'll make a SCE thread for that after my mission.

Also, I apologize for the leet speak, it's the craft's name.

Mods, if however, this belongs in the SCE, move it if needed. 

Edited December 3, 2015 by SpaceplaneAddict
